subject: Re: New Meaning of "Seven" for those who get that message
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Steve:

Nice spiritual interpretation of the number. ;)

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Steve Hultay" <urkel23@...> wrote:
>
> 
>  7.      Seven represents the enlightened person, full special 
> orientation, awareness of 
> manifestation. Seven represents perfect groupings, fullness of 
> planetary and angelic 
> orders. Seven symbolizes perfection of order, energies and 
spiritual 
> principals. Seven 
> represents eternal life and the perfection of a complete cycle. It 
> symbolizes a fresh start 
> after a cycle has been completed and positive regeneration. Seven 
is 
> the fullness of 
> space and time and the fullness of the universe in motions. Through 
> its hidden 
> properties, the number seven maintained all things in being, 
mundane 
> and spiritual, and 
> bestowed life. Seven is the number of crowning achievement.
> 
> A modern interpretation of the number seven affirms that you are on 
> the right spiritual 
> path and that what you are working on creating is very close to 
> coming into being.
> 
> __________________________
> 
> 
> 
> 
> This seems to make the most sense to me so far about the #7 some of 
> us have been getting.
> 
> -Steve H.
>
